sub_title:
Making branding easy for ambitious Entrepreneurs|
Founder & Designer at Tsaroo | Digital Nomad |
Advocate for designing a life you love |
summary:
Ready to create your new branding? Or a new website selling new services and products? Perhaps even a membership. 

Feeling overwhelmed already? I get it. 

I'm here to rescue you!

It's all going to be fine. You just need someone to explain to you in normal english (or dutch) why you need a colour palette and how creating your ideal website doesn't require you to move mountains. 

I don't only define and design brands, but also explain how YOU can make your final product work for you. A new website, brand or logo is not the end of the project, it's the start of your entrepreneurial journey, and that's when you could really use a little simplicity. 

Now, I'll ask again, ready to create your new branding? 

Book a complimentary discovery call today: calendly.com/tsaroo/call

awards.description: 'For your outstanding performance during the 4 week Hackaton held at Laneway International College in the Sydney Start-Up Hub on November 2018'
awards.issuer: Thais Oso | Head of Product Laneway International College

certifications.name: Typ- and practice diploma | 229 keystrokes per minute

projects.title: Im'mersion
projects.description:
Charel Elberse creates experience spaces with the aim to get as many people as possible from the target group to experience (demonstrable) flow. The experience spaces are always a result of collaboration between different creatives , professionals and disciplines, with the senses optimally stimulated and encouraged.
The experience space Im'mersion is a Dome that immerses the visitor. In the new space, the visitor will be made aware of its own different senses. The senses are first deployed one by one and combined later. As they progress, the space becomes interactive. Thoughts, intentions, feelings and senses are focused on the same point. With the interactive element the target group achieve goals, which means they experience happiness. When they return to the outside one feels more consistenty and a calm state of mind. Not only in relation to the inner world, but also towards other people and the world in general.
The target group are people between 20 and 35 years old. Many at this age have already suffered from a burnout,chronic stress or depression. We read, hear and see what the success stories are of other young people. For the target group, not being a succesfull  millionaire at the age of 25 means failure. The people in this age group have big goals and want to achieve this in the shortest possible time. Partly because there are so many options and therefore they do not know where to start, while the pressure to perform is still there. They lose sight of happiness. But the power is in the process, not only in the goal.  
With Im'mersion we go back to give them the feeling of happiness with sensory awareness. During this experience in our space happiness and satisfaction will be measured using biofeedback. We want people to experience happiness through flow so they unconsciously discover what they can do with their own body and mind.

profile_positions.title: Chief Boss Lady

profile_positions.description:
Cocoon Co-living for students, more than home. 

 Assisting remotely in the growth of the start-up Cocoon by managing, hiring and training Leasing Agents. Managing administrational staff to achieve the company goals. Assisting in customer support and Business Development. 

In under 3 years, we've housed over 700 tenants, we're looking at a growth at a rate of 15-20% MOM
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Manager

profile_positions.description:
Amazon Web Services (AWS) provides a complete set of cloud computing services that enable you to build sophisticated & scalable applications. AWS cloud computing delivers low cost, on-demand IT resources via the Internet with pay-as-you-go pricing.

Learn more at http://aws.amazon.com/what-is-cloud-computing/

Thomson Reuters - "We were able to reduce operating expenses by 40% - 50%..." 
http://aws.amazon.com/solutions/case-studies/thomson-reuters/

Shazam - “AWS gave us the flexibility to easily bring a massive amount of capacity online in a short period of time.” http://aws.amazon.com/solutions/case-studies/shazam/
profile_positions.title: Sales Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Quantum Group is a leading investment company providing a range of financial advisory, property funds management, investment research, development services and financing facilities to professional investors, individuals, accountants and financial dealer groups in Australia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, China, Singapore and Malaysia. 

Since inception in 1999, Quantum has managed property development projects in excess of $1.4 billion, via Quantum Funds Management Limited, a registered funds management company with the Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC). Quantum employs a disciplined underwriting methodology and investment criteria; focusing on capital preservation, and active asset management.
profile_positions.title: Executive Personal Assistant to Founder and Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
Worrells is a firm dedicated to solvency management, insolvency administration and forensic investigation. Our proprietary technology is unrivalled in our profession. With our twice daily online updates, we provide relevant and comprehensive information in real time on current files. We also provide a wealth of general information and current news impacting on insolvency and fraud issues.

With 26 partners and over 100 staff in 25 locations across QLD, NSW, ACT, VIC, SA, and WA our initial consultations are complimentary and confidential.
Worrells have now been providing high quality insolvency and related services for over 40 years. We pride ourselves on offering reliable and practical solutions to those burdened with debt. Our large investment in state of the art proprietary software streamlines all functions leading to savings which are passed on by way of competitive pricing.

Operating locally and resourced nationally we provide the ideal mix of prompt personal attention from local partners, backed up by national research and support services.
profile_positions.title: Administration and Marketing Assistant

profile_positions.description:
•Primary contact for my clients 
•Campaign management: implementing, managing, analysing and improving programmatic campaigns
•Collecting data from print & digital advertising campaigns
•Provide Administrative Support in Salesforce 
•Managing the relationship between media agencies, such as GroupM, Dentsu Aegis Network, and  their account managers 
•Resourcing the sales team with data, reports and other information to assist sales
•Providing the sales team leads from incoming calls and customer service enquiries
•Monitoring advertising content
profile_positions.title: Corporate Mediaplanner & Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Focuses on management in the creative industries through:
- Design Thinking
- Project management
- Design management
- Concept development
- Promotion, marketing and communication
- Entrepreneurship

Graduation Project: Im’mersion

Within the process and techniques from Design Thinking  I build my own company by pitching for investors and put together the perfect team to realise the concept. 

The experience space Im'mersion is a Dome that immerses the visitor. In the new space, the visitor will be made aware of its own different senses. The senses are first deployed one by one and combined later. As they progress, the space becomes interactive. Thoughts, intentions, feelings and senses are focused on the same point. With the interactive element the target group achieve goals, which means they experience happiness. When they return to the outside one feels more consistenty and a calm state of mind. Not only in relation to the inner world, but also towards other people and the world in general.

The target group are people between 20 and 35 years old. Many at this age have already suffered from a burnout,chronic stress or depression. We read, hear and see what the success stories are of other young people. For the target group, not being a succesfull millionaire at the age of 25 means failure. The people in this age group have big goals and want to achieve this in the shortest possible time. Partly because there are so many options and therefore they do not know where to start, while the pressure to perform is still there. They lose sight of happiness. But the power is in the process, not only in the goal.  

With Im'mersion we go back to give them the feeling of happiness with sensory awareness. During this experience in our space happiness and satisfaction will be measured using biofeedback. We want people to experience happiness through flow so they unconsciously discover what they can do with their own body and mind.
profile_positions.title: Visual Art and Design Management  | Bachelor of Arts

profile_positions.description: The Creative Business Club supports talented upcoming and established designers, artists and creative projects on the business side of art. We work closely together with the ones who need it and provide consults, talks and courses for the ones who want it. We let us guide by passion, dreams, hunger for innovation & information, entrepreneurship and creativity.
profile_positions.title: Production and Creative

profile_positions.description:
Natalie de Koning’s own fashion line, I am Nold, is also based on the theme of sustainability. She believes that clothes should be worn for more than a single season, and her aim is therefore to create pieces that combine to form a substantial basic collection, so there is no need to replace them every six months. Her I am Nold designs are created individually from recycled, ecological and fair trade materials. The designer also uses innovative technologies to make the fashion industry more environmentally friendly. Natalie de Koning wants to promote a consumer society that is healthier than our present one, which she considers too impersonal, fast-paced and destructive to humans and animals. In the future, she hopes to team up with researchers and biologists with a view to discovering more new and green techniques. 

My job during my internship at Natalie de Koning was to create a marketing plan aimed at better use of the social media channels.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern
